meanings.definition: Inclined to avoid work or exertion; lazy.
meanings.sent1: The slothful cat slept all day without chasing any mice.
meanings.sent2: She was often scolded for her slothful attitude towards her chores.
meanings.sent3: The slothful turtle decided to take a nap in the middle of the race.
meanings.sent4: His slothful behavior was like a heavy weight dragging him down.
meanings.sent5: The slothful student never completed his assignments on time.

meanings.sent1: The slothful river meandered through the valley at a leisurely pace.
meanings.sent2: The slothful sloth moved slowly through the trees, hardly making a sound.
meanings.sent3: The slothful snail finally reached the finish line after a long journey.
meanings.sent4: The slothful clouds drifted lazily across the sky, casting shadows below.
meanings.sent5: The slothful sloth seemed to be in no hurry to reach its destination.
